company_info.name: The Health Factory
company_info.mission: Bread Badlo Aadat Nahi (Change the bread, not the habit). To provide bread in its truest formâ€”wholesome, nutritious, and free from preservatives.
company_info.delivery_policy: Mumbai/Pune: Orders before 6 PM get free next-day delivery. Others delivered day after tomorrow. No Sunday delivery.
company_info.subscription_offer: Up to 30% off on 52-week subscriptions. Options: 2 weeks to 52 weeks.

faq_content.question: What makes your bread different?
faq_content.answer: Our bread is 'Zero Maida,' meaning 0% refined flour. We use 100% whole wheat or multigrain. No chemical preservatives, emulsifiers, or added colors.

faq_content.question: Is the protein bread vegetarian?
faq_content.answer: Yes, Multi-Protein Bread (whey & milk) is vegetarian. We also have a Vegan Protein Bread which is 100% plant-based.

faq_content.question: What is the shelf life?
faq_content.answer: Because we use no preservatives, shelf life is shorter (3-4 days). Keep refrigerated to extend freshness.

faq_content.question: Where do you deliver?
faq_content.answer: We currently deliver in Mumbai, Pune, Delhi NCR, and Bangalore.
